main event: A brilliant blue white light with two parallel trails was observed in the sky over South Dakota.
interesting points: The object displayed a brilliant white light with diminishing intensity towards the rear,The observation lasted for 4-5 seconds,The object was descending at an angle of twenty-five to thirty degrees,Observations were made from two aircraft flying from New York,The sighting occurred at night on 17/03/92.
sighted object: brilliant blue white light with two parallel trails
witness description: United Airlines and American Airlines captains
